bibl.title: Underwater Archaeology in the Canopic Region in Egypt. The Topography and Excavation of Heracleion-Thonis and East Canopus (1996-2006). Translated by Ludwig VON BOMHARD.
bibl.publisher: University of Oxford. Institute of Archaeology
bibl.note: Institut européen d'Archéologie sous-marine and Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology in cooperation with the Supreme Council of Antiquities, Egypt, 1996-2006. - 1. Introduction: The Canopic region - presentation of the project. - 2. The ancient topography of the Canopic region - East Canopus. - 3. Heracleion. - Bibliography. Index.

series.title: Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology. Monograph

bibl.seg: GODDIO Franck, Underwater Archaeology in the Canopic Region in Egypt. The Topography and Excavation of Heracleion-Thonis and East Canopus (1996-2006). Translated by Ludwig VON BOMHARD. (Oxford Centre for Maritime Archaeology. Monograph 1.)
Oxford, University of Oxford. Institute of Archaeology, 2007, 4°, xvi-136 pp., nombr. figg., cartes, pll. coul. ISBN 0-9549627-3-7. £52.
